name: TURRET SYNDROME VR
description: Tower Defense game in first person view, it can be played in VR with Oculus Rift or in non VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: +3 GHZ dual core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 TI or AMD equivalent Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
